ygData.subject: FW: [eq_wizards] Everquest E-Mail Scam
ygData.msgSnippet: That is too funny.  Who would ever give their account passwords to anyone is an idiot...not to mention the fact giving it to EQ_Producers@ HOTMAIL.com?
ygData.messageBody:
That is too funny. Who would ever give their account passwords to anyone is
an idiot...not to mention the fact giving it to EQ_Producers@ HOTMAIL.com?
Hotmail? sheesh, the mailbox of many scams. Oh well, maybe it is a sort of
darwinistic computer thing here?

hehe,

Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@...]
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 9:30 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Everquest E-Mail Scam


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

This is a bit off topic, but since all of our E-Mail addresses are
easily obtainable from this list, I thought you should all be made
aware. This message was posted on the EQ-Vault News page.

Email Scam
